name: Hilf & Hilf, PLC
description: Specializes in immigration law, with an attorney fluent in Mandarin Chinese. They serve clients in the Detroit and Grand Rapids areas
services: Asian-owned Legal representation in Michigan consultation

name: Mingwei Yan PLLC
description: Handles general civil matters including family law, landlord-tenant, contracts, corporation and business, and immigration. The attorney is an immigrant from China and understands the challenges faced by foreigners in the U.S. legal system
services: Asian-owned Legal representation in Michigan consultation

name: Michael S. Yu (Antone, Casagrande & Adwers, P.C.)
description: Focuses on business immigration matters and speaks conversational Korean. The firm specializes in assisting individuals and businesses with various immigration needs
services: Asian-owned Legal representation in Michigan consultation

name: Claire D. Vergara and Aleanna B. Siacon (Plunkett Cooney)
description: Both are associate attorneys at Plunkett Cooney and have been appointed to executive positions on the Michigan Asian-Pacific American Bar Association (MAPABA) board. Plunkett Cooney is a large firm with offices across Michigan
services: Asian-owned Legal representation in Michigan consultation

name: Michigan Asian-Pacific American Bar Association (MAPABA)
description: This is a bar association for Asian-American lawyers in Michigan, formed to promote the legal interests of the Asian-American community. It does not provide direct legal services but is a resource for legal professionals
services: Asian-owned Legal representation in Michigan consultation

name: Sanford Heisler Sharp McKnight, LLP (Asian American Litigation and Finance Practice Group)
description: This firm has a dedicated practice group that assists Asian Americans in navigating the U.S. legal system, leveraging cultural expertise and language skills
services: Asian-owned Legal representation in Michigan consultation

name: Just Right Law
description: Offers employment law services and emphasizes a personalized approach to legal solutions
services: Asian-owned Legal representation in Michigan consultation

name: Shimek Law Firm, PLLC
description: Handles a variety of legal issues including divorce, probate, bankruptcy, and personal injury
services: Asian-owned Legal representation in Michigan consultation
